channel.title: Marisa Tomei on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Marvel Stars Stand for Jimmy Kimmel: Pedro Pascal Defends Free Speech While Others Endorse Boycott
item.description: Hollywood stars — including those with Disney, ABC, Hulu and Marvel Cinematic Universe credits — are continuing to show their support for the ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host in the wake of his suspension.

item.title: Jane Fonda, Mark Ruffalo, Sanaa Lathan and Marisa Tomei Set for Mental Health-Inspired ‘This is Crazy!’
item.description: The play, to be mounted as a benefit production for NAMI in New York on Oct. 6, comes from V, the Tony Award-winning playwright formerly known as Eve Ensler, as a tribute to late talent manager Chris
